frontmatter.title: ColorCompatibility Library
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I [wrote previously](/blog/dark-mode-uicolor-compatibility) about a technique I use in [Trestle](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/trestle-the-new-sudoku/id1300230302?mt=8) and [CIFilter.io](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cifilter-io/id1457458557?mt=8) to support iOS 12 and lower while still using system provided, dark-mode accessible colors...

frontmatter.title: iOS 13 UIWindowScene Black Screen
frontmatter.mdxPreview: I've encountered this bug enough times that I figured it was time to write a quick post about it. If you've looked into [multiple window support](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit/app_and_environment/scenes) for your app in iOS 13, you might know that a lot of the setup you used to have to do in the app delegate now lives in the scene delegate instead...

frontmatter.title: UIButton: Padding Between Image and Text
frontmatter.mdxPreview: Pop quiz: in a `UIButton`, how do you set a padding of 10pt between the image and the title? I had to do this at work recently, and I was surprised at how hard it was to reason about. There are several posts talking about this topic (including [this one](https://medium.com/short-swift-stories/using-uiedgeinsets-to-layout-a-uibutton-44ba04dd085c) which uses edge insets to flip the title and image!), but the answer for my use case was pretty hard to find...
